content: अवशिष्ट {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Left, remaining; स्तंबेन नीवार इवावशिष्टः <ls>R. 5. 15</ls>; किमवशिष्टमह्नः <ls>Ratn. 3</ls>; निद्रागमसीम्नः कियदवशिष्टं <ls>Mv. 6</ls>; कियदवशिष्टं रजन्याः <ls>Ś. 4</ls> how much of the night yet remains (has yet to run). {@--2@} Remaining over and above, surplus. --ष्टं, --ष्टकं Rest, remainder, remnant; <ls>Y. 2. 47.</ls>
